mapper.select: SELECT /* kr.ac.collage_api.dashboard.mapper.DashboardMapper.selectStudent */ cour.lctre_nm /* 강의명 */ , est.lctrum /* 강의실 */ , est.estbllctre_code /* 개설강의코드 */ , skl.sklstf_nm /* 교직원명 */ FROM atnlc_reqst at INNER JOIN estbl_course est ON at.estbllctre_code = est.estbllctre_code INNER JOIN all_course cour ON est.lctre_code = cour.lctre_code INNER JOIN profsr prof ON est.profsr_no = prof.profsr_no INNER JOIN sklstf skl ON prof.sklstf_id = skl.sklstf_id WHERE stdnt_no = #{stdntNo} AND reqst_year = #{year} AND reqst_semstr = #{period}
